title: Orbit Camera Free-look System
description: Introducing "Orbit Camera" – Unlock the ability to free-look around any object, providing an immersive and dynamic perspective for your projects.
longDescription:
Unlock the ability to free-look around any object, providing an immersive and dynamic perspective for your projects.

Tailored for vehicles but functional with any pawn, "Orbit Camera" offers a seamless and intuitive system that allows users to look around, mirroring the functionality of system's used in popular games such as ArmA 3.

Key Features:

  • Unmatched Freedom: Explore your environments with a full 360-degree view around any object.
  • Intuitive Controls: Effortlessly navigate your scenes using controls that feel natural and responsive.
  • Versatility for Vehicles: Perfect for vehicles, "Orbit Camera" is there when you need it and get's out of the way when you don't.
  • Inspired by ArmA 3: Benefit from a camera system reminiscent of the widely acclaimed ArmA 3 game. If you're a fan of that level of control and immersion, "Orbit Camera" will seamlessly integrate into your Unreal Engine projects.
  • Efficient Integration: Easily integrate the plugin into your existing projects with our flexible and simple set up process.

Transform the way you interact with your Unreal Engine projects – elevate your development experience with "Orbit Camera" today!

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Full 360° rotation around your pawn, with the ability to be clamped if required!
  • Extremely simple integration with automatic event bindings, or handle them yourself in Blueprints!
  • "Hold" and "Toggle" modes, comes with a full EnhancedInput InputMappingControl setup ready to use and customise.
  • Two types of zoom functionality, adjusting the spring arm length or the camera's field of view for a temporary zoom.
  • All values customisable such as rotation sensitivity, interpolation speeds, zoom factors, etc!
  • 6 Blueprint events to work with!
  • All functionality exposed to Blueprints!
  • Free-look system inspired by games like ArmA 3.
  • First and Third person view mode support.
  • Exposed status variables so you can prevent other inputs from handling if Orbit Camera is active. 

Code Modules:

  • OrbitCamera / Runtime

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Network Replicated: Not required, used on the client side only

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64

Documentation: https://hrzn.games/orbit-camera/
